title: Revisiting ‘Glengarry Glen Ross’ and ‘Reservoir Dogs’ on Their 30th Anniversary
description: These dramas, both known for distinctive (and salty) dialogue, didn’t make much of a box office impression in 1992. But their influence is still being felt.
dc:creator: Jason Bailey
media:description: From left, Quentin Tarantino, Michael Madsen, Edward Bunker and Steve Buscemi in “Reservoir Dogs.”
